messages.messageBody:
**Off to buy kool-aid just in case...**

One of the mostly useless bits of information I have stored away is the date
of the Jonestown suicides. November 18, 1978. I remember because for years and
years and YEARS I would hear on the radio sometime during the day on my
birthday "And on this date in 1978 Jim Jones...". Oh and I probably wouldn't
remember the 1978 part except that my oldest son was about six months old then and I
remember walking around carrying him thinking of all those children.

I wonder if my youngest kids would get the kool-aid reference?

Deborah
